name: Arale 3 - Ncha! Bycha
description:
Arale part 3 - Ncha! Bycha

a simulation of a handheld game.

Greet the characters as they appear with the Ncha button, before they get angry and hit you.

FEATURES:
- High scores via Game Center
- Characters that appear suddenly
- Three different handheld colours to choose from
- NCHA! button
- Zoom option
